ij.gui
Class TextRoi

java.lang.Object
  ij.gui.Roi
      ij.gui.TextRoi
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class TextRoi
extends Roi

This class is a rectangular ROI containing text.

See Also:
